title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
**Product Listing: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange**

**Product Description:**

Take your DIY projects and small repairs to the next level with the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set. This comprehensive general household hand kit is designed to provide you with all the essential tools you need to tackle various tasks around the house. The set includes 39 high-quality tools, carefully selected to cover a wide range of applications.

**Key Features:**

- **Durable and Corrosion-Resistant:** The tools are heat-treated and chrome-plated to ensure they withstand the rigors of frequent use and harsh environments.
- **Comprehensive Tool Kit:** Includes a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, tape measure, and many more tools to help you complete small repairs and DIY projects.
- **Easy Organization:** The plastic toolbox storage case features tool compartments, keeping your tools tidy and within reach.
- **Portable and Convenient:** The lightweight toolbox comes with a carrying handle, making it easy to transport your tools to any job site.
- **Ideal for DIY Amateurs and Avid Handymen:** Whether you're a beginner or an experienced DIY enthusiast, this tool set is perfect for anyone looking to upgrade their toolkit.

**Product Specifications:**

- **Tool Count:** 39 pieces
- **Color:** Orange
- **Storage:** Plastic toolbox storage case with tool compartments
- **Portability:** Lightweight with carrying handle
- **Suitable for:** Small repairs, DIY projects
- **Gift Idea:** Yes, this tool set is an excellent gift for anyone who loves DIY projects or wants to start building their toolkit.

**Order Your CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set Today!**

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to upgrade your toolkit with the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set. Order now and start tackling those DIY projects with confidence!
